title: UEFA Champions League Overview
content: The UEFA Champions League (UCL) is an annual club football competition organized by the Union of European Football Associations (UEFA) and contested by top-division European clubs. It is one of the most prestigious football tournaments in the world. The current format involves a group stage followed by a knockout phase.

title: Most Successful Club
content: Real Madrid is the most successful club in the history of the UEFA Champions League, having won the competition 15 times. Their most recent victory was in 2024.

title: Top Goalscorer
content: Cristiano Ronaldo holds the record for the most goals scored in the UEFA Champions League, with 140 goals.

title: Finals Location 2025
content: The 2025 UEFA Champions League Final will be held at the Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany.
